title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message:
Hi i have this board that sometimes will work at first but as soon as you turn it off it would not power on again, but i think as long as it was on it would stay on.
Anyway i had it sitting around for a while and started looking into it, i have found it in S0 state but missing PP0V6_S0_DDRVTT would this be bad U7400?
No signs of liquid damage on the board

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: That voltage requires MEMVTT_PWR_EN; do you get it?

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: How do you know it?s shorted to ground what is resistance to ground on that line?

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: Really short to ground, board will never boot...

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: Sorry yeah it?s not shorted to ground . Just lower resistance then it should be. I will check voltage tomorrow and report back thanks

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: 2informaticos you are correct that voltage is missing, Seems somehow i overlooked that pp3v3_S0 is missing, Found it to be actually be shorted to ground, 1 ohm resistance to ground. Is it safe to inject voltage starting at 1v?

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message:
First remove U8030.
If short still there, than you can inject voltage at 3V3_S0.
Don't go over 3.7V!

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: Thanks you are correct u8030 was shorted, Can this chip be purcahsed pre balled?

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: Never mind i found it on Rossman Store. Will order it and report back once replaced cheers mate

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: I received the IC today and replaced U8030 and board is now working turning on every time thanks for you help mate.

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message:
Well i just put the board into a machine and seems it has another issue now, fan spins high all the time have cahnged I/o board and cable and track pad with known working still same issue.
HWMonitor reports Heat pipe 2 and Heat pipe outgoing air 128c I have no idea what to look at as im still new to this.

Still seems to work fine though not laggy at all just fan running full spped.

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: Check if works good disconnecting camera cable.

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: Still same, i dont recall it having this issue before when it would intermittently turn on maybe i messed something up.

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: Any other sensors failing on HWMonitor?

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: Just Heat pipe 2 and Heat pipe outgoing air, where would I find this area on the board ?

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message:
Should be on LIO board.
Inspect LIO connector on MLB under microscope; especially pins 11 & 13.
Check R5370/71 and post diode mode to ground on SMBUS_SMC_2_S3_SCL/SDA.

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message:
Think i found the issue, Pin 9 J9500 is missing like its been pulled out probably i was a bit rough with it.
It is PP3V3_S0 (Although the original short to ground was on that line?)

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: I wonder if i can run a wire to the I/O board? i wouldnt know where to run it though as there is no schematic

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message:
SMBUS_SMC_2_S3_SCL/SDA is 0.701 in diode mode
R5370/71 are reading correct

title: 820-00165 PP0v6_S0_DDRVTT Shorted to ground
message: Well its finally all working now, i ran a wire to the LIO cable its a bit dodgy but hey its working. Thanks for the help much appreciated.
